relation: Made with Creature Editor 3.0, a piece of software that was made before the Spore Creature Creator was released, as a 2D mock-up of it.
Shh! I got what you need...

Armor from Mother 1. When I was a kid, I LOVED Dungeons and Dragons type medieval fantasy stuff and over the years a drew a TON of knights and dragons and stuff. I loved all the Dragon Warrior and Final Fantasy stuff when it came out (and stuff like "The Sword of Fargoal" and "Knight Games" on the old Commodore 64), but when EaarthBound came out, it was a nice change of pace. So I always thought that in EB0, when the knight appeared, that it sort of defied that "trying to break the RPG rules" theme of the game. This is an hommage to that, and was a bit like time-travelling to my shining-armor chlidhood.
